Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Easy access to two major interstate networks: immediately adjacent to I-40 with 3,000 feet of frontage and visibility, 7 minutes from I-25 (Big I interchange)
New infrastructure planned to include Bluewater Road connection and new signalized intersection at Bluewater and 98th Street providing increased access and connectivity
Zoned NR-BP Non-Residential Business Park (City of Albuquerque)
Easy access and proximity to all quadrants of city

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: This dynamic site is located along Interstate 40 in the fastest growing industrial corridor in Central New Mexico. This opportunity represents the largest contiguous land site available in the City of Albuquerque making it the perfect location for large-scale development with the flexibility of subdividing for smaller requirements.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 115± ACRES - CUSTOM TRACT SIZES POSSIBLE - BUILD-TO-SUIT, GROUND LEASE AND SALE
